titles.title: Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2006
To prevent congressional reapportionment distortions.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: 5/22/2006--Introduced. Fair and Accurate Representation Act of 2006 - Amends federal census law to direct the Secretary of Commerce to adjust census figures as necessary so that illegal aliens are not counted for purposes of the apportionment of Representatives in Congress.
